overview: Can cheating be justified? Here it can! Let's face it, there some very terrible boyfriends and husbands out there, so who can blame a stunning horny housewife for getting some extra cock, especially if her boyfriend has to be persuaded to fuck her, and when he does it lasts 30 seconds. Join Pure XXX Films and find out what 5 cheating horny housewives get up to when their crap partners aren't around in, "Cheating Horny Housewives," and we assure you won't be surprised!
title: Cheating Horny Housewives
